Room.Name: Open Air Altar
Room.ShortDescription: You are near an great stone altar built between the jungle and the cemetery.
Room.LongDescription: The altar is covered with voodoo symbols and blood. A still twitching corpse of a headless human lies on top of it, with fresh blood running into troughs designed to funnel the warm, red liquid into a basin at the end of the altar. Behind you, at the jungle edge, you hear a low, monotonous chanting.
